data.title: Ronald E. "Ronnie" Cushman Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: CUSHMAN, Ronald E. "Ronnie" - Age 52, of Linden, passed away November 22, 2023. A Celebration of Ronnie's Life will be held 2 PM Wednesday, November 29, 2023 at Sharp Funeral Ho...
data.text:
CUSHMAN, Ronald E. "Ronnie" - Age 52, of Linden, passed away November 22, 2023. A Celebration of Ronnie's Life will be held 2 PM Wednesday, November 29, 2023 at Sharp Funeral Homes, Linden Chapel, 209 E. Broad St., Linden. Memorial Contributions in Ronnie's memory may be made to Adopt-A-Pet Fenton.

Ronnie was born February 5, 1971 in Flint, the son of Ronald and Pamela (McMullen) Cushman. Ronnie graduated from Flushing High School in 1989. He later graduated from Northwestern College in Lima OH in 1991 with a degree in Diesel Mechanics. Ronnie was employed as a Diesel Mechanic with AT&T for many years. He was a very devoted mechanic and extremely proud to work for AT&T! Ronnie loved working on mechanical projects in his Pole barn. He loved helping family and friends with anything they need repaired. Ronnie enjoyed snowmobiling and dirt bikes.

Ronnie is survived by, his parents, Ron and Pam Cushman; sister, Annalee Cushman; and his grandmother, Anna Lee Todd. "There are no words to describe how much Ronnie was loved and how much he will be missed."
